project_abstract.cdata: The West Pakistan Education Project is intended to increase Pakistan's capacity for the education and training of professional agriculturalists, technical teachers, and industrial technicians. It consists of the construction of buildings, purchase and installation of equipment for the establishment or expansion of facilities for agricultural education at two universities and for technician training at fourteen technical institutes, and provision of expatriate personnel and training grants for technical teacher training at three polytechnic institutes.
